DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Salvianolate Injection Elderly Patients With Unstable Angina Pectoris
DOC.detailed_description: This parallel , double blind , randomize , control , multi-center study evaluate efficacy safety salvianolate injection elderly patient unstable angina pectoris . Patients treat without salvianolate injection basis conventional therapy 14 day . The primary measure effectiveness include change baseline end treatment angina score . ( Angina score table : sum 4 item ) , variation EKG ( level S-T segment ) . , Additional measure effectiveness include change baseline end treatment Seattle Angina Questionnaire ( SAQ ) , EuroQol-5 Dimensions ( EQ-5D ) perform throughout study . Patients complete double-blind portion study follow 28 day . Effectiveness assess 7 day , 14 day 28 day . Safety evaluation ( incidence adverse event , , physical examination , laboratory test ) perform 7 day , 14 day 28 day study .
